Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Ai doesn't have depth, obviously, and it feels flat and uninspired which prevents it from giving high quality work that I can utilise. However it is quick and can teach straight to the point.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Felt less distressed when it was AI giving me feedback because I just didn't trust it. When teachers give feedback you know where you have definitely gone wrong.
